(重)这一趟的行程，我们将和小农夫们一起坐船到马来西亚的吉胆岛。梁轩宁、蔡凯恩和他们的爸爸首次踏足红树林，一起动手制作做螃蟹的网，学习用原始的捕蟹工具来捕捉螃蟹。此次行程小农夫们也学习了如何腌制咸鱼–渔村不能缺少的食材。.

programme.title: 我家是联合国 Home Of United Nations - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Pei Qi grew up in a well-to-do family. As a result of a turn of events, her parents decided to offer their services as student caretakers, and converted their bungalow into a "student hostel" for international kids. From then on, children from all over the world started to move in. These kids from different countries were initially resistant and dismissive of one another. As Pei Qi witnesses their loneliness and yearning for home, she puts herself in their shoes and finally realizes how fortunate she is. Pei Qi starts to reach out and make friends with them. Through mutual support and learning, they built a sincere friendship that transcends geographical boundaries. (重)一个从小生活在富有家庭的小千金佩娸, 因为父親生意失敗,不得以將原本宽裕的洋房改为〞学生宿舍〝. 从此面对来自中囯,韓囯,印尼,俄罗斯和印度等不同国家的学生… 这一群不同囯藉的小朋友,一开始就亙相抗拒,歧视和排彻,更甚至結党紛爭,直到有一次佩娸见识到他们思家的心情,离鄉的孤独,才身感其受,领悟到自己是多么的活在福中不知福,从那一刻起佩娸主动的伸出友誼之手,大家坦开心房,透过彼此的关心,扶持和学习,建立起不分囯界的真挚友情….

programme.title: 少年师爷 Little Counsellor Season 11 & 12 - EP 0043 & 0044

programme.title: 春花望露 Spring Flower - EP 394

programme.title: 我。董。你 Be My Guest - EP 1
programme.desc: Be my Guest, a brand new interview show helmed by established news and current affairs presenter Ms Tung Soo Hua, will give you insights to people who are movers and shakers in their own fields, like entrepreneurs, renowned artistes and influencer. This 5-episode series, positioned as an infotainment programme, will see Soo Hua visiting her guests to find out more of their work and lives, and interacting with them in an intimate and light-hearted manner. 全新资讯节目《我. 董. 你》由知名新闻主播和时事节目主持人董素华带领观众走入知名人士的内心世界。董素华将一改她以往新闻主播的严肃形象，与来自各领域的佼佼者以轻松但不失内涵的聊天方式谈观众深感兴趣的课题，同时亲身体验他们的生活和工作。.

programme.title: 从裕廊到万礼 ：第一步 The Great Migration: First Steps - EP 1

programme.title: 梦想家计划 Project Dream Home - EP 6

programme.title: 星期二特写- 人生八九十2 Tuesday Report - Ninety Years Young 2 - EP 4

(重)73岁的朱敬芬在本地粤剧界驰骋66年，演过各种行当。11年前，她成立新艺剧坊，虽然是个业余剧团，她却力求演出达到专业水准。她的弟妹、女儿、外甥女也是她最忠实的朱家军，每次演出总是全家出动。.

programme.title: 谢谢你出现在我的行程里 Walk With Me - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Jia Qi is shocked when she discovers that Xiu Yu intends to spend a big sum of money on a spirit medium to find out if Wei De indeed had a mistress. Jia Qi worries that her mother will be cheated and after discussing with Hui Yan and the rest, they decide to get Chen Guang to pretend to be a medium. But Chen Guang slips up and Xiu Yu sees through the whole act. Xiu Yu is furious when she realises that it was all planned by Jia Qi. (PG)(重)嘉琪得知秀玉竟然要花大钱，找灵媒问韦德是否有小三的事，感到很吃惊。她担心妈妈被人骗，与慧妍等人商量，众人决定找成光假扮灵媒，免得秀玉受骗。不料成光露出破绽，被秀玉当场揭穿。秀玉知道一切是嘉琪的安排后，怒不可遏。.

programme.desc: (R) Power struggle within a notorious mafia gang led to the murder of several triad leaders. This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

However, though the Li family look happy on the outside, there are conflicts aplenty behind closed doors. (PG)(重)《李记饼铺》代代相传已有百年，看似幸福美满的三代同堂，其实暗潮汹涌。老太爷李万世育有二子，长子再传留在饼店里帮忙，私生子再兴则流落在外，生活潦倒。主演：黄少褀饰高天诚，六月饰陈慧心，韩瑜饰李正男，方文琳饰罗秀琴。.

programme.title: 一点新闻 News 8 At One - EP 222

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 67
programme.desc: (R) Jin Zhi is followed by a mysterious person. Deng Bo arrives and chases him off and gets hurt in the process. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)金枝埋首包云吞，没察觉到一陌生男子正慢慢靠近她，对方正欲有所行动，邓波及时出现，对方事机败露，急忙离开。邓波追去，被对方用利器攻击。金枝不信，指邓波危言耸听，目的是能名正言顺地留下来。邓波不愿辩驳，继续默默守护金枝。.

programme.title: 小城花样多 Small Town Surprises - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) This week's Small Town Surprises brings us back to Terengganu! What other fun surprises await us in this episode? Follow our host, Hui Xin, and the Foo Family as they have a taste of the local Peranakan delicacies in Terengganu's Chinatown. The Foo sisters also learn about self-defense from a Silat master, as well as the unique art of wood carving in Terengganu! (重)这一集的《小城花样多》带大家回到了登嘉楼！登嘉楼还有什么好吃好玩的呢？跟着城管慧馨，还有我们的符家，到登嘉楼的唐人街品尝让人垂涎三尺的道地娘惹美食！符家姐妹花也向当地的马来传统武术老师学习了实用的防身术。他们还拜见了经验老道的木雕刻师傅，深入了解登嘉楼独具特色的木雕刻手艺！.

programme.title: 奶爸百分百 Nanny Daddy - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) A story about daddies who are also nannies. (重).

programme.title: 我爱黄金屋 Four Walls And A Ceiling - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) The dream of the freehold chamber continues. In Singapore, at least. And what better way to wake up and smell the bank loans than by walking in the shoes of property agent Terence Cao, who knows all about that. (重).

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 319
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 谢谢你出现在我的行程里 Walk With Me - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Judy tells Xiu Yu that the whole meeting with spirit medium was a deliberate arrangement to test her. Judy says that she is actually a lawyer, executing the will on behalf of Wei De. Wei Des days were numbered as he had contracted cancer and he was worried about Xiu Yus welfare upon his passing. Thus Wei De drew up a will leaving Judy as the administrator of his assets which can only be given to Xiu Yu once she is able to live independently. (PG)(重)Judy告诉秀玉，灵媒的事是她故意安排，以试探她。她的真正身份是个律师，受韦德所托，完成他的遗愿。韦德因患癌，时日无多，担心妻女在他离世后的生活。他于是立下遗嘱，将另一笔遗产交给Judy管理，要确定秀玉能够独立生活后才能交给她。.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 25
programme.desc: (Part 2) The Xus discuss with Zhiming about demerging the company while the Huangs are away. Xiwen drowns her sorrow in alcohol over her dog's demise. She confesses her love for Chengfeng in a drunken stupor, shocking Chengfeng. (PG)(第25集下)许家趁黄家去旅行，与志明洽谈公司分拆之事。希文的爱犬囝囝离世，希文伤心喝酒悼念，醉时竟向乘风告白，吓了他一跳。.

programme.title: 内颤 Terror Within - EP 1
programme.desc: Ming Jie, a psychologist, conducts counselling sessions for the survivors a week after the terror attack. She tries to intervene when Grandma Wang, who is the grandmother of the attacker Zhi Xiong, becomes an outcast in the community. (PG-些许暴力画面)(首播)恐怖袭击后的一个星期，心理医生明洁替生还者们进行辅导。在大家的形容下，明洁逐渐拼凑出当天的画面。因为孙子志雄的所作所为，王婆婆受到街坊们的唾弃。明洁试图帮忙，却也遭受攻击。.

programme.title: 星期二特写- 人生八九十2 Tuesday Report - Ninety Years Young 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Singaporeans live the longest in the world with an expected lifespan of 84.8 years. The series follows the success of its first season and continues to feature several senior citizens, showing their positive outlooks towards twilight years. 新加坡人越来越长寿，平均可活到84.8 岁。第二系列的《人生八九十》发掘和展现更多长者的人生姿彩。有的曾经叱咤风云，有的老来追求梦想，他们如何让黄金岁月充溢能量？.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 13
programme.desc: Yu Wen confesses her love to Zi Le. Yu Wen realises that the reason Zi Le did not dare to tell her how he feels as he misunderstood her relationship with Wei Jun. Yu Wen has always seen Zi Le as her significant other. The two decide to not miss each other anymore. (PG)雨汶突然向子乐表白，令子乐手足无措。雨汶明白子乐误会她和伟君的关系，才不敢表白。雨汶指自己早就认定他是自己的伴侣。两人决定不再错过彼此。.

programme.title: 健康密码 第二季 Health Code S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Hosted by Boey Leung & doctor writer Ouyang Lin, this brand new season sees medical specialists talking about illnesses that affect your daily life. 知名医生作家欧阳林搭档梁宝仪主持的全新医疗保健节目，邀请专科医生解开疾病迷思，同时有营养师分享正确饮食观，让你轻松在生活中掌握健康密码。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 25
programme.desc: Wei Wuxian took Wen Clan's old and young to the unmarked graveyard, ready to live there.When Jiang Cheng brought his men to the unmarked graveyard, he realised that Wei Wuxian has no intention to establish his own kingdom. (PG)魏无羡带着温氏残余的老幼妇孺来到乱葬岗，准备在那里栖身。江澄带人来到乱葬岗才知道，魏无羡并没有自立为王。.

programme.title: 破茧而出 Metamorphosis - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Power struggle within a notorious mafia gang led to the murder of several triad leaders. Before detectives Ouyang Li (Chen Hanwei) and Dylan (Terence Cao ) get to the killer, he was murdered. A series of chain murders occur where the dead are criminals. This led the detectives to uncover an underground operation "Dragontooth". Wen Wanrou (Yvonne Lim), a psychiatrist embroiled in a murder case, plots against Ouyang when he accidentally caused the death of her family. (PG)(重)神秘的"龙牙组织" 专门杀害"该死"的凶徒，暗地里进行“正义的制裁"，因而涉及一连串迷离命案，受到警方的调查。警探欧阳(陈汉伟)和狄伦(曹国辉)查出该组织首领的身份，并将他逮捕。可是，“龙牙组织"却挟持欧阳的养母，迫使他不得不救出首领。不久，欧阳还遭到陷害，被警方误以为是杀人凶手，只好逃亡。他暗中查出是曾经被他意外导致家破人亡的温婉柔(林湘萍)在对他进行报复。.

programme.title: A Taste Of Festival - EP 6
programme.desc: Wedding is a big event in life. Let's learn banquet dishes from various restaurants, such as chrysanthemum fish, passion fruit salad prawns & sous vide grilled pork ribs, Peranakan wedding customs & wedding cakes. Chef Miller also demonstrates a betrothal dish - Steamed Cod Fish with Coconut Water. 结婚，是人生中的头等大事。主持人除了走访几家餐馆，了解婚宴菜肴如菊花鱼、百香果沙律明虾、低温香烤排骨的烹调手法之外，也会介绍土生华人的婚礼习俗和婚庆糕点。厨师麦大融则示范以过大礼的食品烹煮椰汁蒸鳕鱼。.

programme.title: 快乐王子 Happy Prince - EP 14
programme.desc: Zi Le meets Yu Wen's parents officially. Hao Xiang recognises Zi Le as the delivery boy and is concerned. Through Da Wei's guidance, Zi Le was able to answer questions smoothly and also succeeds in suppressing his illness. Hao Xiang's impression of Zi Le changes. (PG)子乐正式拜见雨汶父母，浩翔认出他就是那个送餐员，脸色一沉。子乐依照达威的教导，对答入流，并成功控制自己不让病情发作，令浩翔对他印象改观。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) The prison van escorting Jin Ben suddenly explodes on the road. Zhiyan frantically calls out for Jin Ben when she witnesses the scenes following behind the van. Meanwhile, Junxiu and Junxi cry sadly after they find the golden fish that symbolises Jin Ben dead in the tank. Ailin looks at it and has an ominous premonition. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)押送金本的囚车在路途中突然爆炸，现场马上成了一片火海，跟着囚车后面的智妍立刻下车疯狂地哭喊着金本；另一边厢俊秀和俊熙在家喂鱼时，发现象征着金本的那条金鱼死了，都伤心地痛哭，爱麟看了,有不祥的预感。.

(重)离开了古都布哈拉，《极境之旅》出发前往克孜勒库姆沙漠的营区。在大漠之中，主持人葛凡将会有什么初体验？最后，我们来到了传说之城撒马尔罕，走进了时空隧道，去了一趟伊斯兰的古文明世界，葛凡将会有什么新启发？.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 14

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 3

(重)对旧家具情有独钟的一对夫妻，住家是家也是展示店，把兴趣变商机，倡导环保生活。大学生休学一年，为实现梦想，在校园里开设手工面包店。放弃保镖生涯，助爱妻圆梦，设计自家品牌手提包。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Recruit Veronique argues with Sergeant Ong over why the entire platoon has to be constantly punished for Pepper's mistake. Sergeant Ong emphasizes that the platoon is a team and not just one person. Hence, a person's mistake is also the entire team's mistake. Veronique doesn't accept her punishment and even challenges Sergeant Ong to a battle. How will all this pan out? Later during her book-out day, Pepper and Jian Dong hang out at a cafe where Hulk and Xinyi are dating. (PG)(重)Sergeant Ong强调整个platoon要有的是teamwork，不是rambo，所以处罚整个platoon。Veronique不满，说为什么每次都是她做错，我们整个platoon都要受罚？Veronique不满，和Sergeant Ong吵了起来，最后还挑战Sergeant Ong。Sergeant Ong接受挑战。众人book out 后，Pepper从建东那里得知Hulk和何欣怡去一间Café用餐，于是也跑去那里。Rose建议Pepper找一个帅哥亲热，让Hulk吃醋，可是找来找去的都不是帅哥，最后只好找了建东。.

programme.title: 美食大翻新 Foodie Makeover - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) There are many famous food bloggers locally. The first one to accept the challenge is Daniel@Daniel Food Diary! The food that he wants to give a makeover is the "mala hotpot" which is popular among local youngsters recently! In order to have a successful makeover, Daniel has also enlisted the help of a professional chef! Can blogger Daniel, who only eats and doesn't cook, succeed in creating a new dish? Will his food-tasters like it? (重)本地有多位著名的美食博客，首集接受挑战的是Daniel（@Daniel Food Diary）！他想翻新的美食是近年来本地年轻人爱吃的“麻辣香锅"！为了“翻新"美食成功，他找来了一位大厨和他一起研发。到底只会吃不会下厨的Daniel，第一次试验新美食会成功吗？食客会喜欢吗？.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) In Vietnam, a lion dance troupe specifically recruits street kids as members. The founder of the troupe does not look to profit, but hopes to change their lives through lion dance practice. However, it requires a lot of commitment and perseverance. Can lion dancing truly make a difference for them? (重)在越南，有位年轻人创办了一个以街童为主要团员的舞狮团，目的不在赚钱，而是要以舞狮为媒介，改变街童的命运。然而舞狮是一门讲究技术的表演艺术，考验着团员们的毅力；究竟这个方法在性格各异的青年中是否奏效？.

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Hong Kongers go absolutely gaga about goose! From stir-fried goose intestine, braised goose tongue to gelatin made with goose brain, it seems almost every part of the goose can be eaten! Check out Food Notes as we appreciate the different Teochew and Cantonese styles of cooking goose in Hong Kong. (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Yonghao and Xianshu pass away after they are both involved in the same accident at the construction site. Xianshu's creditors want Malu to bear responsibility for Xianshu's debts. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)永浩和贤淑双双在一场工地意外中受伤，相继离世。贤淑的债主到灵堂追债，逼马陆还钱，马陆因此突然背负一大笔债务。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 4
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Wu Chun misses Feng Ji Tang's orientation when it coincides with Yonghao's passing. As a result of that, Feng Ji Tang decides not to take in Wu Chun. Wu Chun turns up at Feng Ji Tang to plea for a second chance, but Yalan orders the security guards to throw Wu Chun out of the company instead. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴春因为永浩过世而无法参加丰吉堂的培训，结果被取消录用。吴春到丰吉堂苦苦哀求，雅兰却命令警卫把她赶走。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 1
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Zhao Dehao is the prosecutor of a corruption case involving the chairman of the Dahe Group. After exposing the chairman's trick of faking illness, he is framed for corruption instead. As a result, Dehao is sentenced to six months' jail. After his release, Dehao is reduced to a street beggar. Even so, he helps people fight for justice. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)赵德浩作为大和集团郑会长私吞公款案件的检方，在众人面前踢穿郑扮病的诡计。他的上司为了阻止德浩揭发他受郑会长贿赂，陷害德浩反被举报收受贿赂，并因此被判有期徒刑6个月。出狱后的赵德浩无家可归，沦落为街头乞丐，但仍帮助别人取回公道。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 2
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Dehao rushes to the courtroom when he finds out that the trial of an arson case from three years ago is on. The prosecutor is shocked to see Dehao at the trial as a lawyer... (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)当德浩发现三年前的纵火案在举行庭审时，他立刻赶去现场。对于德浩突然以律师的身份出现在北加佐洞流浪汉纵火杀人案的公审现场，控方律师感到震惊。。。。。.

programme.title: 声音的抉择 Singing Choice - EP 8
programme.desc: A music variety where the singer will compose a song and find the right voice to sing it. Featuring singers such as Li Quan, Gary Chaw, Jam Hsiao, Kenji Wu, A-Niu etc. 《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲。.

programme.title: 怪食记 Weird Food Diaries - EP 8
programme.desc: No feast is off limits for Rozz in Indochina. Discovering how modern Khmer dining evolved out of adversity, she comes head-to-head with bug burgers, big hairy tarantulas, amphibians and a beef stew with a creepy garnish. (PG-部分画面令人不安)在“怪食记”中，狂热的美食家Rosalyn Lee（也称为Rozz）正在寻找亚洲最奇异的食物。 从粘糊糊的沼泽蠕虫到生活美食，Rozz在日本，越南，柬埔寨，台湾，泰国，韩国，印度尼西亚和菲律宾各地旅行,并尝试当地街头奇异美食还是高级美食。在这一集中，她将带大家去菲律宾品尝当地的奇怪的食物。.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 1
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Xu Ren is a brilliant doctor during ancient times working in a community clinic. He has an unwritten rule - stop treatment whenever the bell sounds - regardless of how urgent the condition of the patient is. Cui Yanjing is a brilliant modern day doctor. She is banned from entering the operation theater as she has offended the professor's VIP guest previously. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(首播)(双声道-中/韩)许任是一名在惠民署工作、医术极其高明的古代医员。他有一个不成文的规矩：只要是到了敲钟的时间，无论患者的情况多么危急，他都会停止治疗。崔妍京是现代的一名医术高明医生，因上次得罪了教授的VIP客户，被禁止进入手术室。.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 2
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) One day, Xu Ren gets summoned into the palace to treat the king's illness. However, his hands keep trembling and he fails to treat the king's ailment. The king orders Xu Ren to be arrested. Xu Ren escapes the pursuit of the royal guards but falls into the river after getting shot by an arrow. He finds himself in a strange world when he wakes up and runs into Yanjing who is searching for her patient on the street. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)这天，许任被召进皇宫替皇上治病，但他的手一直发抖医不了皇上的病。皇上生气地命人捕捉他。许任逃过了禁卫军的追捕，却在中箭后掉进了河里，当他醒过来的时候发现自己来到了一个陌生的世界, 并在街上遇到了正在寻找病人的妍京。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 声音的抉择 Singing Choice - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) A music variety where the singer will compose a song and find the right voice to sing it. Featuring singers such as Li Quan, Gary Chaw, Jam Hsiao, Kenji Wu, A-Niu etc. (重)《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲。.

programme.title: 太阳的后裔 Descendants Of The Sun - EP 10
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Xu Daying and Liu Shizhen found some survivors under the ruins and Liu Shizhen quickly gave treatment to them based on Jiang Muyan's instructions. At this moment, Manager Tan started to dig using the excavator and caused the ruins to collapse. Liu and the survivors lives were in danger! (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)徐大英与刘时镇在废墟中找到生还者，刘时镇便依照姜暮研的指示对伤者进行救助。此时，陈所长擅自启动挖掘机，令废墟再次塌陷。刘时镇与伤者都危在旦夕！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Discover how you can kick start a healthy lifestyle with this indoor exercise equipment. 足不出户、不用上健身房也能练身体？到底是怎么样的产品呢？.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Do you want a solution to your household troubles? Find out how a good mop can do more with less effort. 好的拖把能让家务事半功倍！你也想要一支解决你拖地的烦恼吧.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Discover how you can wake up every morning glowing and refreshed as our hosts prove how a comfortable pillow is key for a good night's sleep. 好的枕头能让你一觉醒来精神抖擞、容光焕发。来，躺躺看吧!

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals for Joy
programme.desc: Is there really a tumbler that can maintain the temperature of your hot and cold drinks for a long time? Find out how amazing this tumbler is as Jeremy fires a blowtorch to it. 真的有长效保冷以及储热的杯子吗？一起看看它有多神奇.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 Puzzle Masters - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters" is a reality cum variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brain power. Wang Feng, Wang Yuhang and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Tao Jingying is invited as the resident guest of the programme. (重)“最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑"邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力.节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、王昱行和鲍雲担任队长，陶晶莹则受邀当常驻嘉宾。.

programme.title: 太自游 Funtastic - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Funtastic is a travelogue with a difference, various artistes in each episode who will bring viewers to their favourite travel destinations. They will introduce unique local specialties and interact with the locals. What's more, the artistes will be put to the test to overcome obstacles along the journey or undertake activities they have never attempted before. (重)非一般的旅行，绝对刺激的新体验！李腾，许立桦，谢宛谕和李玲带你探索泰国鲜为人知的旅游宝地，教你如何尽情享受自由旅行之乐，成为一个真正的泰国自游达人！.

programme.title: 生活达人 Life's Perfectionists S9 - EP 4
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm. (重)(双声道-中/韩)本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 奇异特工 Odd-upation - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) France records the most number of pets owned in Europe, and the French love their pets so much that there is a unique pet nutritionist industry that takes care of the pets diet. What special care and planning do a pets nutrition and taste require? Let's find out more with the host in France. (重)法国的宠物数量居欧洲之首，法国人对宠物的宠爱程度，导致专门照顾宠物饮食的“宠物营养师"这一特殊行业应运而生。宠物的营养和口味，究竟有什么需要特别照顾和设计的？请跟随奇异特工黄靖伦到法国一探究竟。.

programme.title: 消失中的亚洲食物 Vanishing Foods - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) A culinary discovery takes food blogger, Aun Koh up Taiwan's central mountain range to a Paiwan tribal village. He learns about Yao Yao Fan, a simple dish that hails back to the tribe's past as a foraging people. With modern conveniences and changing tastes, this dish is at risk of becoming lost. (重)美食博客许安来到了台湾中部山脉的排湾族部落。排湾族的摇摇饭是一种简单的菜肴，可以追溯到部落作为觅食者的过去。随着现代口味的变化，这道料理面临失传的危机。.

programme.title: 退休地图 Retiring in Paradise - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Tony Hung brings audience into the retirement world and introduce the different countries suitable for retirement at affordable costs. (重)洪永成带着观众的退休梦，亲身寻访地图上既符合大家预算，又可轻松退休的地方。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 5
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Wu Chun stands up for Meida when a customer displays unreasonable behaviour. However, Meida is unappreciative and scolds Wu Chun instead. Wu Chun decides to leave home as she has been treated unfairly for many years. Subsequently, Meida brings Wu Chun home as she wants Wu Chun to shoulder Yonghao's debts. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)有客人在餐厅闹事，吴春为美达出头，美达却不领情。吴春受不了美达长期把怨气发泄在她身上，决定离家。随后，美达为了要吴春扛下永浩的债务而把吴春找回来。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 6
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Yalan is touched when Taihao helps her clinch a business deal and also decides not to rush her into a wedding engagement. Qiutian puts on Malu's ring without seeking Wu Chun's permission. Qiutian loses the ring later and causes Wu Chun to be unable to return it to Malu. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)泰浩帮雅兰立了大功，还决定不催她订婚，令雅兰很感动。秋天没有问过吴春就把马陆的戒指拿去戴，结果把戒指弄丢，害吴春没办法把戒指还给马陆。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Dehao appears in court as legal representative for Bian Zhishi in the arson trial. Worried that Dehao will expose him of false accusation of Bian as murderer, Dehao's ex-father-in-law tells his lawyer to send a rookie, Enzu to keep watch on Dehao. Dehao's ex-superior is also worried, so he reminds his son, Zhixu, to handle the case with care. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)德浩突然以卞知识的代表律师身份出现在法庭处理纵火杀人案，他的前岳父信佑担心德浩会揭发他们诬赖卞知识是杀人凶手的真相，吩咐金太政律师派菜鸟恩祖去监视德浩的一举一动。德浩的前上司瑛溢也很担忧，叫他的儿子志旭要小心处理那宗案件。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 4
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Bian Zhishi thinks his son has committed the arson and killed someone accidentally so he voluntarily takes the blame. Dehao believes an innocent man should not be jailed. He tries to find out the truth and hopes to nail the real culprit. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)卞知识以为是儿子承慕纵火错手杀了人，所以自愿揽下罪名。德浩却认为没有杀人的卞知识不应该这样子坐牢，故千方百计调查真相，希望能找到真正的犯人，为卞知识洗脱杀人罪名。.

programme.title: 中国梦之声：我们的歌 Young Forever - EP 1
programme.desc: "Young Forever" is a new music variety where established singers such as Hacken Lee, Fei Yu Qing, Grasshoppers, Francis Yip will pair with the new generation of singers like Henry Lau, Mao Bu Yi, Hua Chen Yu etc to perform a re-arranged song in their own style. "中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Yanjing wakes up in the hospital and finds weirdly dressed Xu Ren imposing as her boyfriend. The nurses in the hospital are whispering while she cannot get him off her back. Yanjing is frustrated and thinks hard to get rid of him. Meanwhile, Hela's heart condition worsens as she refuses to accept operation. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)妍京在医院醒来后，发现装扮古怪的许任冒认是自己的男友，再加上又一直甩不掉跟在她后面的他，医院里的护士都在窃窃私语，让她简直要气炸了，便想办法打发他。另外荷拉因为不接受手术而令到心脏情况更坏。.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 4
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Hela's runaway from operation puts a lot of pressure on Yanjing. The fact that everyone think it is Yanjing who saves Hela on the aisle makes it worse. Yanjing reviews the surveillance video footage and finds that it is Xu Ren who revives Hela with acupuncture. However, the professor announces to the public that it is Yanjing's credit for the sake of reputation. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)荷拉拒绝动手术出逃的事情给了妍京很大的压力，再加上大家都以为是妍京在走廊救活了荷拉，让她的压力就更大了。妍京去看事发时的监控视频，发现是许任施针救活荷拉的，但是教授为了顾及颜面，对外称是妍京的功劳。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 中国梦之声：我们的歌 Young Forever - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) "Young Forever" is a new music variety where established singers such as Hacken Lee, Fei Yu Qing, Grasshoppers, Francis Yip will pair with the new generation of singers like Henry Lau, Mao Bu Yi, Hua Chen Yu etc to perform a re-arranged song in their own style. (重)"中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.title: 中国梦之声：我们的歌 Young Forever - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) "Young Forever" is a new music variety where established singers such as Hacken Lee, Fei Yu Qing, Grasshoppers, Francis Yip will pair with the new generation of singers like Henry Lau, Mao Bu Yi, Hua Chen Yu etc to perform a re-arranged song in their own style. programme.title: 太阳的后裔 Descendants Of The Sun - EP 11
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Jiang Muyan's voice recording of her love for Liu Shizhen was accidentally played out in the army, causing much embarrassment to Jiang. The next day, Jiang Muyan went into a mines field and Liu Shizhen again came to her rescue. On their way back, both confessed their feelings to each other and kissed to their new romance. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)姜暮研暗恋刘时镇的一段录音意外在兵营被播出，让姜暮研十分尴尬。姜暮研误闯地雷区，刘时镇再次英雄救美。回程中，姜暮研与刘时镇坦诚对彼此的感情，并一吻定情。.

programme.title: 守护者 The Guardians - EP 6
programme.desc: China has a high percentage of visually-impaired people. For the blind, to be robbed of their vision and life opportunities is a tragedy. The guardians not only tend to the needs of the visually-impaired, they also help in their integration into society. 中国是世界上第一人口大国，视障的人数庞大。对盲人而言，因为没有视力而被剥夺了生命当中选择的权利是最大的不幸。因此守护者所要守护的不仅是视障人士的生活需求，更是他们融入社会的希望。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 2 Mars Vs Venus 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Is men the weaker gender in a relationship? Due to societal pressures, men often hide their emotions and portray a masculine image. It is often said that breakups hurt women more in the short term but men never fully recover. Let's listen to what the guests have to say about this! 男人在感情世界里是弱者？碍于世俗眼光，他们必须隐藏内心的想法，不能宣泄被女人甩后的痛楚! 看郑斌辉和黄嫊方展开唇枪舌剑捍卫自己的观点！此外，嘉宾们也会分享分手的技巧和分手时的遣词用字。千万不要错过！.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 43
programme.desc: Ep 53: Hengkui plans to confess his feelings for Huizhu on Christmas Eve when he is misled into thinking that Huizhu is going to marry Junxuan soon. Rouzi stops Hengkui as she knows Shanyu does not approve of Huizhu.Ep 54: Hengkui announces to his parents that he wants to marry Huizhu. Shanyu pleads with Huizhu to reconsider as she wishes that Hengkui can marry someone better. Huizhu feels inferior and backs out of her promise to Hengkui. Ep 53: 亨奎以为惠珠真的要跟俊铉结婚了，终于打算在平安夜的晚上想向惠珠表白，却被柔子阻止。柔子说不想对不起珊玉，希望亨奎放弃惠珠。Ep 54: 亨奎向父母宣布即将跟惠珠结婚了。珊玉一直希望亨奎跟家世比较好的女生结婚，介意惠珠离过婚、有孩子，要惠珠重新考虑。惠珠经不起珊玉的哀求，觉得自己配不上亨奎，向亨奎及他的家人道歉后匆匆离开。.

programme.title: 戏子 The Entertainer - EP 14
programme.desc: Ep 15Hena, Zaixun and the rest thought Kaier will reprimand Yanxiu for admitting that he has a son during the fan club event interview. Surprisingly, Kaier praises Yanxiu instead which made them feel out of sorts. Xihao wants to hold a press conference to clear Hena of sexual harassment.Ep 16Yanxiu is too nervous to read the letter from Canxi's mother. This makes the concerned band members anxious too. Gelin borrows Xihao's car to bring Hena out for star gazing. She invites other band memb Ep 15河那与在勋以为延秀在粉丝会坦诚地宣布他有个儿子之事会被凯尔大骂一顿，凯尔却出乎意料之外地赞扬延秀，这反而让他们不习惯。锡浩为了帮河那洗脱罪名，要召开记者会公开说明整起性骚扰案件的经过。Ep 16由于延秀一直很紧张不敢打开灿希妈妈的信，在旁关心延秀的团员也跟着心急如焚。格林向锡浩借车要带河那去看星星，她也叫了团员一起去，结果只有凯尔和在勋不知河那的心意，一起出来游玩，让河那十分气煞。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 17
programme.desc: Shi Guizhen sent her men to beat Xixun up. Qin Zheng warns her not to disturb Xixun, Feeling humiliated, Shi Guizhen vows to take revenge on the Qin's family. Junxiangs stepmother, Lanxue, is upset when her mother-in-law prefers Junxiang's biological mother over her. 史贵贞派手下殴打锡勋，琴政道警告她别骚扰锡勋，史贵贞不干，打算对琴政道全家报仇。兰雪听到家婆以俊相亲生母亲相比，大感不满。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 18
programme.desc: Mingui feels guilty when he saw Xixun scolded by the deceased patient's wife. Junxiang wants to invite Qin Zhengdao to be his first guest for his cooking program. Junxiang and Zhixiang hide their sibling's relationship from Xuehua. 敏圭看到锡勋被病人家属责骂，感到惭愧。俊相邀请琴政道为他节目的第一个嘉宾。俊相与智相瞒着雪花他们的兄弟关系。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 7
programme.desc: After witnessing Hulk proposing to Xinyi, Pepper becomes totally devastated and has lost all motivation to continue her BMT training. Hoping to knock some sense into her, Recruit Rose gives Pepper a huge scolding and tells Pepper she should learn to live her life proud and happy without Hulk. Hulk跪下求婚，Pepper回到军营后好像行尸走肉一样，做任何训练都好不起劲，甚至萌起了退出队伍的念头。一开始加入Army的原因就是为了Hulk的，如今人家都要结婚了，继续下去又有什么意思呢？Rose最后忍无可忍，大骂Pepper，为了一个负心汉搞到自己这样，值得吗？.

programme.title: 一起轻旅行 Travel Together - EP 1
programme.desc: This food programme brings us to all corners of Taiwan in search of delicious and authentic Taiwanese food. Places of reocmmendation include Yi Lan, Bei Tou, Tai Nan, Gao Xiong etc.

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 1
programme.desc: Ep 1: Theatre actress Wu Shan'ni idolizes the Emperor Li He and is thrilled to be selected to have lunch with him. An assassination takes place midway during the lunch. Shan'ni saves Li He, but Li He mistakenly assumes that he is saved by the palace maid, Min Youla. 剧场演员吴珊妮一直崇拜大韩帝国的皇帝李赫，于是报名参加与皇帝共进午餐的活动。宴会中途突然发生袭击事件。珊妮帮李赫脱险，李赫事后却以为是宫人闵宥拉救了他。.

programme.desc: This programme takes a look at some of Taiwan's famous eateries and dishes. Most importantly, the programme also reveals the moving story behind its success. 介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 边缘老人 Twilight Years - EP 2
programme.desc: Despite billions of dollars being budgeted each year for veterans' welfare, some 40,000 veterans remain homeless in the US. Among them, nearly 20,000 are elderly struggling from alcohol and drug abuse, criminal and unemployment issues. How would they tide over the hardships in their twilight years? 美国政府每年拨款千亿美元照顾退役军人，然而，至今仍有约4万老兵无家可归。为什么 酗酒吸毒、犯罪失业、家庭失败…… 老年退役军人因为战争阴影而身心灵受创，他们悲凉的晚景，是谁的责任.

They all feel indignant for Yanxiu when they find out that Jiaen is getting married. Kaier buys a cake to celebrate with the band members for the clearing of sexual harassment charge against Hena and starting of a new life ahead. Hena is very touched.Ep 18Hena wishes to pass his driving test sooner so he asks Xihao to coach him. All are very excited when Zaixun's mother finally gives conse Ep 17凯尔等关心地追问延秀与灿希的妈妈佳恩这次见面后有何进展，当知她要嫁人后，大家都替延秀不忿。凯尔买了蛋糕与团员一起庆祝河那洗脱性骚扰的罪名，要展开新的人生, 让河那十分感动。Ep 18河那为了早一点考取驾驶执照，叫锡浩教他开车。在勋的妈妈终于答应让他加入乐团做鼓手，让大家兴奋万分。锡浩因敏珠隐瞒她是富家千金之事生气，话中带刺讥笑她；而吉柱却对她奉承拍马屁，向她表爱意，敏珠被他俩搞到哭笑不得。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 19
programme.desc: Minxi confronts Xuehua when she saw Xuehua and Xixun together. Xixun senses that Junxiang has a liking towards Xuehua. Xixun surprises the Qin family members with Christmas decorations and cake. 敏熙看到锡勋和雪花在一起，便责问雪花他们是什么关系。锡勋感觉到俊相对雪花有爱意。锡勋为家人庆祝圣诞，家人大受感动。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 20
programme.desc: Junxiang is affected when he saw Xixun's concern for Xuehua. Minxi is jealous when she sees Xixun gives Xuehua a Christmas present. Qin Zhengdao is shocked when he is accused of using contaminated ingredients for his dumplings and is investigated by the Police. 俊相看到锡勋特别对雪花关心，有感不爽。敏熙妒忌雪花收到锡勋的圣诞的礼物。琴政道被指控卖垃圾饺子，大吃一惊。.

The injured Daoxi dashes out onto the road and is knocked down by the car driven by Li He. 道希发现宥拉跟李赫的秘情，于是赶着去通知王植。宥拉为了阻止道希，拿石头往道希的头砸下去。道希迷迷糊糊地走到马路上去，被李赫的车撞个正着。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 1
programme.desc: Ep1 - Brought up by Auntie Wei, a twenty-something Gao Zijie now helps his adoptive mum manage a B&B at a beach resort in Taiwan. They live a relatively simple and quiet life until a gang of thugs come shooting at them. 高子杰自小由薇姨带大，如今已二十出头的他，协助薇姨在台湾的一处海滩圣地，经营一间规模不大的民宿。他们两人相依为命，过着简单宁静的日子，直到有一天，突然涌来一批持枪的凶汉，不分青红皂白地，朝他们开枪扫射。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 2
programme.desc: Ep2 - Having found a photo of himself as a baby being carried by a young woman seemingly in Hong Kong's airport, Gao Zijie decides to travel to Hong Kong in search of his parentage. 高子杰在已被大火焚毁的家里，找到了一帧发黄的照片，显示幼小尚属婴儿的他，正由一名年轻的妇女抱着，地点好似香港的机场。于是，高子杰决定飞往香港，以发掘其不可知的身世。.

programme.title: 注定 Show Hand - EP 9

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 9
programme.desc: From celebrity politicians to white-collar workers, everyone in Copenhagen rides a bicycle and 9 out of 10 persons own a bicycle in this "Kingdom of Bicycles". programme.desc: Izzaty returns to work and much to her surprise, she is offered to head the new social media marketing division. Izzaty is excited but realises this will mean she will spend less time at home. Meanwhile, Lutfi suddenly gets offered a long-term contract which means he will be away from home too. This is a problem since Lutfi had initially agreed to stay home and take care of their son, Irfan. To solve this problem, Lutfi calls Rugayah to help but Liana is having a hard time dealing with Rugayah's constant presence in her home.

programme.title: Bingit 3 - EP 3
programme.desc: Fazeah lives with her father, Salleh, after her mother died when she was still young. Being particular about cleanliness, Fazeah is often at odds with Salleh. Fazeah tries to make herself happy without life commitments after her divorce with Sulaiman a year ago. However, Sulaiman still comes to visit Salleh every now and then which annoys Fazeah. At work, Zulfar, a new colleague, finds interest in Fazeah. Fazeah keeps her cool and only talks to Zulfar on work related matters. Being overly cautious about cleanliness and health, she makes sure the family does not consume outside food. One day, Salleh suffers from food poisoning. Fazeah is quick to blame Sulaiman for buying food for Salleh when he comes to visit. After helping to clean Salleh, Fazeah feels disgusted at herself and keeps thinking about her father's diarrhea episodes. She spends the whole night cleaning herself and ended up being late for work, on the day she is involved in a Science fair. Her boss, Steven, is not happy wit.

programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Ku Kirim Cinta - EP 3
programme.desc: Zarul begins treatment for his leukemia without telling Nisha the truth of his illness. Nordin urged Maisarah to persuade Nisha to stop study and concentrate on the resort. programme.title: Detik 2019-2020 - EP 37

programme.title: Unplugged 2 - EP 12

programme.title: Couple Cosmo - EP 2

Everyone seems to have a skeleton in their closet. What could it be?

programme.title: Bingit 3 - EP 4
programme.desc: blames her father for whatever happens at work and for her mother's death. Sulaiman, who coincidentally drops by their house to visit Salleh, hears the commotion and tells Fazeah off. Fazeah chases her father and Sulaiman out of the house before locking herself in her room. Fazeah becomes more agitated thinking that she does not deserve to be told off and reprimanded. Like any other Shakespearean theatre play the series embeds itself with elements of theatre, literature, romance, power, betrayal, egoism, history, comedy, tragedy and redemption!

programme.title: Arivaan - EP 41
